                                                                    # 2.1.1 @Resultså’Œ@Resultæ³¨è§£

  <result property="email"        column="email"        	/>
  <result property="phoneNumber"  column="phone_number"  	/>
  <result property="description"  column="description"  	/>

  <result property="updateTime"   column="update_time"  	/>

        }
)

                                                                    # 2.1.2 @Selectå’Œ@Paramæ³¨è§£

                                                                    å¯¹äºæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œç”¨@Selectæ³¨è§£ï¼›å¯¹äºå‚æ•°, ä½¿ç”¨@Paramæ³¨è§£

                                                                    æ‰€ä»¥æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·IDæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼å†™æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

        id = "UserResult1",
        value = {
                @Result(id = true, property = "id", column = "id"),
                @Result(property = "userName", column = "user_name"),

                @Result(property = "email", column = "email"),
                @Result(property = "phoneNumber", column = "phone_number"),

        }

                                                                    # 2.1.3 @ResultMapæ³¨è§£

                                                                    xmlé…ç½®æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶å®šä¹‰çš„ResultMapæ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¤ç”¨çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸Šé¢é€šè¿‡@Resultså®šä¹‰åœ¨æŸä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•å¤ç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

                                                                    # 2.1.4 è¡¨å…³è”æŸ¥è¯¢

                                                                    ç”¨æˆ·å’Œè§’è‰²å­˜åœ¨ç€ä¸€å¯¹å¤šçš„å…³ç³»ï¼Œä¸Šé¢çš„æŸ¥è¯¢åªæ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢äº†ç”¨æˆ·çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•å…³è”æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼ˆæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·åŒæ—¶è¿”å›è§’è‰²ä¿¡æ¯ï¼‰å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

  <result property="email"        column="email"        	/>

  <result property="description"  column="description"  	/>

  <result property="updateTime"   column="update_time"  	/>

    <result property="description" column="description"  />

        id = "UserResult",

        }
)

                                                                    å…¶ä¸­findRoleByUserIdæ˜¯é€šè¿‡userè¡¨ä¸­çš„idæŸ¥æ‰¾Role, å…·ä½“æ–¹æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹

            id = "RoleResult",

            }
    )

    List<Role> findRoleByUserId(Long userId);

                                                                    # 2.2 æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ

                                                                    # 2.2.1 @Insertæ³¨è§£

                                                                    å¯¹äºæ’å…¥æ“ä½œï¼Œåœ¨xmlé…ç½®å¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰ä¸ºï¼š

                                                                    <insert id="save" parameterType="tech.pdai.springboot.mysql57.mybatis.xml.entity.User" useGeneratedKeys="true" keyProperty="id">
 		insert into tb_user(
 			<if test="userName != null and userName != ''">user_name,</if>
			<if test="password != null and password != ''">password,</if>
 			<if test="email != null and email != ''">email,</if>
			<if test="phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''">phone_number,</if>
 			<if test="description != null and description != ''">description,</if>
 			create_time,
			update_time
 		)values(
 			<if test="userName != null and userName != ''">#{userName},</if>
			<if test="password != null and password != ''">#{password},</if>
 			<if test="email != null and email != ''">#{email},</if>
 			<if test="phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''">#{phoneNumber},</if>
 			<if test="description != null and description != ''">#{description},</if>
 			sysdate(),
			sysdate()
 		)
	</insert>

                                                                    ç‰¹åˆ«æ˜¯ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œé€šè¿‡<if>åˆ¤æ–­æ¡ä»¶æ›´æ–°çš„æƒ…å†µåº”è¯¥å¦‚ä½•åœ¨æ³¨è§£ä¸­å†™å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

                                                                    å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡@Insert + <script>

                                                                    @Insert({"<script> ", "insert into tb_user(\n" +
        " <if test=\"userName != null and userName != ''\">user_name,</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"password != null and password != ''\">password,</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"email != null and email != ''\">email,</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''\">phone_number,</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"description != null and description != ''\">description,</if>\n" +
        " create_time,\n" +
        " update_time\n" +
        " )values(\n" +
        " <if test=\"userName != null and userName != ''\">#{userName},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"password != null and password != ''\">#{password},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"email != null and email != ''\">#{email},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''\">#{phoneNumber},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"description != null and description != ''\">#{description},</if>\n" +
        " sysdate(),\n" +
        " sysdate()\n" +
        " )", " </script>"})
@Options(useGeneratedKeys = true, keyProperty = "id")
int save(User user);

                                                                    # 2.2.2 è¿”å›Insertåå®ä½“çš„ä¸»é”®å€¼

                                                                    ä¸Šè¿°@Options(useGeneratedKeys = true, keyProperty = "id") è¡¨ç¤ºä»€ä¹ˆæ„æ€å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

                                                                    è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œå¦‚æœæ•°æ®åº“æä¾›äº†è‡ªå¢åˆ—ç”ŸæˆKeyçš„æ–¹å¼ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚è¿™é‡Œçš„id), å¹¶ä¸”éœ€è¦è¿”å›è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼è¿”å›å®ä½“ã€‚

                                                                    é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œå¦‚æœidçš„è‡ªå¢ä¸ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®æ—¶, åœ¨xmlä¸­å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨SelectKeyï¼š

                                                                    <selectKey keyColumn="id" resultType="long" keyProperty="id" order="AFTER">
    SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
</selectKey>

                                                                    å¯¹åº”ç€æ³¨è§£ï¼š

                                                                    @SelectKey(statement = "SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()", keyColumn = "id", keyProperty = "id", resultType = Long.class, before = false)
                                                                    • before = false, ç›¸å½“äºXMLä¸­çš„order="AFTRE"ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯MySqlæ•°æ®åº“çš„é…ç½®ã€‚
                                                                    • before = true, ç›¸å½“äºXMLä¸­çš„order="BEFORE"ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯Oracleæ•°æ®åº“çš„é…ç½®ã€‚

                                                                    æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹ï¼šä¸åŒçš„æ•°æ®åº“statementçš„å€¼ä¼šä¸åŒï¼Œä¸Šé¢ä¸­çš„å€¼é€‚ç”¨äºMySqlæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®åº“æ—¶è¦æ³¨æ„ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

                                                                    # 2.3 æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ

                                                                    æ¶‰åŠæ›´æ–°æ“ä½œçš„ä¸»è¦æ³¨è§£æœ‰ï¼š@Updateç­‰ã€‚

                                                                    # 2.3.1 @Update æ³¨è§£

                                                                    å¯¹äºxmlçš„æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                                    <update id="update" parameterType="tech.pdai.springboot.mysql57.mybatis.xml.entity.User">
  update tb_user
  <set>
    <if test="userName != null and userName != ''">user_name = #{userName},</if>
    <if test="email != null and email != ''">email = #{email},</if>
    <if test="phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''">phone_number = #{phoneNumber},</if>
    <if test="description != null and description != ''">description = #{description},</if>
    update_time = sysdate()
  </set>
  where id = #{id}
</update>

<update id="updatePassword" parameterType="tech.pdai.springboot.mysql57.mybatis.xml.entity.User">
  update tb_user
  <set>
    password = #{password}, update_time = sysdate()
  </set>
  where id = #{id}
</update>

                                                                    å¯¹åº”çš„æ³¨è§£å†™æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                                    @Update({"update tb_user set password = #{password}, update_time = sysdate()", " where id = #{id}"})
int updatePassword(User user);

@Update({"<script> ", "update tb_user\n" +
        " <set>\n" +
        " <if test=\"userName != null and userName != ''\">user_name = #{userName},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"email != null and email != ''\">email = #{email},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"phoneNumber != null and phoneNumber != ''\">phone_number = #{phoneNumber},</if>\n" +
        " <if test=\"description != null and description != ''\">description = #{description},</if>\n" +
        " update_time = sysdate()\n" +
        " </set>\n" +
        " where id = #{id}", " </script>"})
int update(User user);

                                                                    # 2.4 åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ

                                                                    æ¶‰åŠåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œçš„ä¸»è¦æ³¨è§£æœ‰ï¼š@Deleteç­‰ã€‚

                                                                    # 2.4.1 @Delete æ³¨è§£

                                                                    å¯¹äºxmlçš„åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                                    <delete id="deleteById" parameterType="Long">
  delete from tb_user where id = #{id}
</delete>

<delete id="deleteByIds" parameterType="Long">
  delete from tb_user where id in
  <foreach collection="array" item="id" open="(" separator="," close=")">
    #{id}
      </foreach> 
</delete>

                                                                    å¯¹åº”çš„æ³¨è§£å†™æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                                    @Delete("delete from tb_user where id = #{id}")
int deleteById(Long id);

@Delete({"<script> ", "delete from tb_user where id in\n" +
        "<foreach collection=\"array\" item=\"id\" open=\"(\" separator=\",\" close=\")\">\n" +
        "#{id}\n" +
        "</foreach>", " </script>"})
int deleteByIds(Long[] ids);

                                                                    # 3. Provideræ³¨è§£

                                                                    å…¶å®ä½ å¯ä»¥å‘ç°é€šè¿‡æ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¯¹äºæœ‰ä¸€äº›éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡åŠ¨æ€æ„å»ºæŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶çš„æ“ä½œæ˜¯éå¸¸ä¸æ–¹ä¾¿çš„ã€‚MyBatisçš„ä½œè€…ä»¬è‡ªç„¶å°±æƒ³åˆ°äº†åŠ¨æ€æ„å»ºSQLï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€æ„å»ºSQLçš„æ–¹å¼æ˜¯é…åˆ@Provideræ³¨è§£æ¥å®Œæˆçš„ã€‚

                                                                    MyBatisæä¾›äº†4ç§Provideræ³¨è§£ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯@SelectProviderã€@InsertProviderã€@UpdateProviderå’Œ@DeleteProviderã€‚

                                                                    è¿™é‡Œä»¥@SelectProviderä¸ºä¾‹æ¥æ ¹æ®IdæŸ¥è¯¢Userï¼š

                                                                    1. å®šä¹‰åŒ…å«è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç”Ÿæˆçš„åŠ¨æ€SQLçš„ç±»ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚UserDaoProvider
                                                                    /**
 * @author pdai
 */
public class UserDaoProvider {

    public String findById(final Long id) {
        SQL sql = new SQL();
        sql.SELECT("u.id, u.password, u.user_name, u.email, u.phone_number, u.description, u.create_time, u.update_time");
        sql.FROM("tb_user u");
        sql.WHERE("id = " + id);
        return sql.toString();
    }
}
                                                                    1. é€šè¿‡@SelectProvideræ³¨è§£å…³è”åˆ°å®šä¹‰çš„ç±»å’Œæ–¹æ³•
                                                                    @ResultMap("UserResult")
@SelectProvider(type = UserDaoProvider.class, method = "findById")
User findById2(Long id);
